DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect CyberKnife radiosurgery patient early stage organ-confined prostate cancer evaluate effect treatment quality life time .
DOC.brief_title: CyberKnife Radiosurgery For Low & Intermediate Risk Prostate Cancer : Emulating HDR Brachytherapy Dosimetry
DOC.detailed_description: In study , CyberKnife radiosurgery use produce dose distribution comparable create HDR brachytherapy treatment , without use invasive catheter . The radiosurgery volume closely make resemble HDR brachytherapy therapeutic volume similar dose limitation objective adjacent normal tissue . The CyberKnife Robotic Radiosurgery System unique radiosurgical system capable treating tumor anywhere body noninvasively sub-millimeter accuracy . The CyberKnife System deliver radiation use precise target methodology allow focal treatment margin around target , thus limit volume adjacent tissue receive high dos radiation . This turn allow delivery high dos radiation prostate short series treatment .
DOC.criteria: Patient must least 18 year age Histologically proven prostate adenocarcinoma Biopsy within 1 year date registration Clinical Stage T1bT2b , N0 , M0 Patients belong one follow risk category : Low Risk : CS T1bT2a , Gleason Score 26 , PSA < = 10 ng/ml Intermediate Risk : CS T2b , Gleason Score 26 , PSA < = 10 ng/ml CS T1bT2b , Gleason Score 26 , PSA < = 20 ng/ml CS T1bT2b , Gleason Score 7 PSA < = 10 ng/ml ECOG performance status 01 Clinical Stage T2c great Prior prostatectomy cryotherapy prostate Prior radiotherapy fo prostate lower pelvis Implanted hardware material would prohibit appropriate treatment planning delivery History invasive malignancy basal squamous skin cancer last 5 year Hormone ablation two month prior enrollment treatment
